D1.NPC: *Yawn* Hmm... Wonder if things will be okay when we get back...

D2.NPC: *Sigh* Where's my coffee when I need it...

D3.NPC: (Johnny seems to be silently enjoying his fresh coffee today)

D4.NPC: Seems like there are so many problems lately...

D5.NPC: Damn it, the stupid power out made my coffee machine break...

D6.NPC: Mmm... I really feel like we can't trust them...

2.NPC: Morning. Did you end up readjusting the settings for the ship's course?

3.Player: No, I didn't. Something must have happened...

5.NPC: Sometimes, it feels like they didn't fund this project enough.

6.Player: Well... We're almost home at least.

7.NPC: Yeah. Hopefully things will be okay once we get home.

1.Player: Do you know what happened earlier?

2.NPC: I didn't really go by the engine room if that's what you're asking.

3.NPC: I found it weird to hear that the settings had been changed too.

4.NPC: Sometimes I wonder if we were being set up.

5.NPC: Sometimes, it feels like they didn't fund this project enough.

7.NPC: Mmm... Nevermind. It's probably just this old man's paranoia.

2.NPC: Yeah, he finally got off of his butt and helped out.

3.NPC: You've been fixing a majority of the issues nowadays.

4.NPC: He's definitely had more free time to mess around lately.

6.NPC: Maybe you should... He almost broke my coffee machine, you know.

7.NPC: Just keep him out of my things...

8.NPC: It seems like more problems have been occuring lately.

9.NPC: I don't know if it's all just coincidence anymore.

2.NPC: Hm...? I haven't been by communications, so I couldn't really say.

3.NPC: Maybe that feeling of paranoia was right...

4.NPC: I can't say whether we've been set up but there have been too many issues lately.

6.NPC: All of us have something in common, kid.

1.Player: Did you see anyone by the power room?

2.NPC: Nope. You think someone's causing problems on purpose?

3.Player: ... I don't have any proof... but...

4.NPC: I see... You have a good head on your shoulders... I would be cautious too.

5.NPC: I can't say I would even trust myself... but the others may take it badly.

6.NPC: We've been together on this mission all these years after all.

2.NPC: *Johnny spits out his coffee* Fuck! You scared me! I meant the ones who highered us.

3.NPC: I told you didn't I? There's something we all have in common.

4.NPC: Well... Either way, even if I don't trust them, we're here anyways.

5.NPC: I can't do much about it now. So I just have to wait and see.

6.NPC: Just be careful kid. I could care less about myself, but you all are still young.

2.NPC: I'm probably going to just go back to living normally, the way I used to.

3.NPC: I doubt they'd call me in again after this... I'm getting too old.

4.NPC: Someone else would end up taking my place on the next mission though.

5.NPC: They always bring a crew member who has taken on the mission there before.

2.NPC: I love coffee and alcohol. You'd probably find me in a cafe or bar.

3.NPC: Really, I was only doing this for the money to live easy with my family.

2.NPC: It was a while back... They went about recruitment the same way.

3.NPC: Every one of us recieved a letter of recruitment.

4.NPC: We went through the same training and the same deal.

5.NPC: We returned to earth afterwards... but I lost contact with them.
